Transportation: SW called Modivcare (1-866-527-9934) to check on the status of the patient's ride since the pick up window expired. Modivcare Rep shared that the driver should be at CHOP in about 1 hour. The driver told the Rep that when he called earlier for pick up, someone said the family was no longer at the hospital. SW confirmed that they are still here at CHOP so Modivcare is sending someone back out for them. The driver will call the nurses station upon arrival.
